prompt:
Given the incident text, return JSON with fields: category (incident/outage/degradation/maintenance/security), severity (low/medium/high/critical), source (string), time_window (last_15m/last_hour/last_day/multi_day), and tags (1-5 short strings). Do not invent fields or values.

Incident: GPU cluster utilization above 90% for multiple days; schedulers throttling new jobs and queue times growing.
